items.name: Potion
items.description: Restores 150 HP. The effect decreases if used in the field.
items.effect: Restores 150 HP in battle and 100 HP in the field.

items.name: Hi-Potion
items.description: Restores 450 HP. The effect decreases if used in the field.
items.effect: Restores 450 HP in battle and 300 HP in the field.

items.name: Phoenix Down
items.effect: Revives a character from being KO'ed.

items.name: Phoenix Pinion
items.description: Cures KO. It cannot be used in the field.
items.effect: Revives a character from being KO'ed but can only be used in battle.

items.name: Elixir
items.effect: Fully restores the HP and MP of a single character no matter how low they are.

items.name: Annoyntment
items.effect: Gets rid of the Trouble negative status effect from a single character.

items.name: Antidote
items.effect: Gets rid of the Venom and Poison negative status effects from a single character.

items.name: Soft
items.effect: Gets rid of the Petrify and Gradual Petrify negative status effect from a single character.

items.name: Gysahl Greens
items.description: Cures Berserk. Item has no effect in the field. Chocobo’s favorite food.
items.effect: Gets rid of the Berserk negative status effect from a single character and can be used to summon a Chocobo on the main map.

items.name: Dead Pepper
items.description: Deals damage to the target. If you give it to a Chocobo…
items.effect: Can be used to have Choco open Mountain Cracks, dive into Dive Spots and fly up to the Chocobo’s Air Garden.

items.name: Eye Drops
items.effect: Gets rid of the Darkness negative status effect from a single character.

items.name: Echo Screen
items.effect: Gets rid of the Silence negative status effect from a single character.

items.name: Vaccine
items.effect: Gets rid of the Virus negative status effect from a single character.

items.name: Magic Tag
items.effect: Gets rid of the Zombie negative status effect from a single character.

items.name: Remedy
items.effect: Gets rid of the Darkness, Gradual Petrify, Mini, Poison, Silence, Stop and Venom negative status effect from a single character.

items.name: Ether
items.description: Restores 150 MP. The effect decreases if used in the field.
items.effect: Restores 150 MP in battle and 100 MP in the field.

items.name: Tent
items.description: Restores HP and MP. If you ask a save Moogle, he will restore everyone’s HP and MP.
items.effect: Can be used when speaking to a Moogle or on the field. Restores a large amount of HP and MP and can be used to cure Darkness, Poison and Silence negative status effects.
